articles.description: Mark Schlabach joins OTL to discuss the news that a U.S. District Court denied a motion to dismiss federal criminal charges against three of the 10 men arrested for their alleged roles in the FBI's two-year investigation into college basketball corruption
articles.headline: Court denies dismissal off CBB probe

images.caption: Mark Schlabach joins OTL to discuss the news that a U.S. District Court denied a motion to dismiss federal criminal charges against three of the 10 men arrested for their alleged roles in the FBI's two-year investigation into college basketball corruption
images.name: Court denies dismissal off CBB probe

articles.description: Reggie Lynch maintains his innocence against sexual misconduct allegations but has dropped appeals of his Minnesota expulsion because he does not feel he could receive a fair hearing.
articles.headline: Reggie Lynch drops appeals of sexual misconduct rulings, accepts expulsion

articles.description: A U.S. District Court judge denied a motion Thursday to dismiss federal criminal charges against former Adidas executives James Gatto and Merl Code and former sports agent Christian Dawkins in the FBI's investigation into college basketball corruption.
articles.headline: Judge denies motion to drop charges in corruption case against ex-Adidas execs, agent

images.caption: Mark Schlabach joins OTL to discuss the news that a U.S. District Court denied a motion to dismiss federal criminal charges against three of the 10 men arrested for their alleged roles in the FBI's two-year investigation into college basketball corruption
images.name: Court denies dismissal off CBB probe

articles.description: With Kentucky missing an edge, along with a couple of pieces, could the reeling Wildcats miss the NCAA tourney for the second time under John Calipari?
articles.headline: Is this John Calipari's most disappointing Kentucky team ever?

images.caption: John Calipari has looked for ways to reach his young Kentucky team but hasn't found one yet.
images.name: John Calipari [576x324]

articles.description: Have Oklahoma's recent troubles made Trae Young not a sure thing for the Wooden Award? Arizona's Deandre Ayton is among the players who might get another look.
articles.headline: Wooden Watch: Can someone catch Trae Young?

images.caption: Seth Greenberg explains why Collin Sexton's game will translate better in the NBA than Trae Young's.
images.name: Greenberg would take Sexton over Young for NBA

articles.description: Ayton's rare combination of productivity, NBA-ready physique and upside have him neck-and-neck with Luka Doncic as the top prospect in this year's NBA draft. What questions does Ayton need to answer?
articles.headline: Why isn't Deandre Ayton the clear favorite for the No. 1 draft pick?

images.caption: How good is Deandre Ayton's case for No. 1?
images.name: Deandre Ayton [608x342]

images.caption: Arizona freshman Deandre Ayton is a force in the paint -- and one of the best players in college basketball.
images.name: Ayton's explosiveness spicing up the Widcats
